pullrequest.title: Convert copyright file to follow Debian DEP 5

content.raw:
Please make sure this is really the case by running "licensecheck --check=. --recursive --copyright ."
The ouput of this tool should match what you claim in this file. In particular even if I wrote so in my package, all the 3rd party code you include need their own declaration as the copyright holder is different.
